Abstract  摘要

Meituan pioneered an on-demand food delivery service in China, which allows consumers to place food orders online for fast delivery. Leveraging its minute-level delivery network and boasting more than five million active couriers, Meituan delivers more than 60 million orders daily, ranking it as the world’s largest in terms of order volume and courier count. It has transformed itself into one of China’s most critical delivery infrastructure providers. To meet its service commitment to customers and improve the working experience of its couriers, Meituan must continuously optimize its order assignment decisions. Thus, it developed a real-time intelligent dispatch system, including a set of algorithms based on operations research and machine learning techniques, to precisely model the assignment problem in a dynamic and uncertain environment, and solved this NP-hard problem in seconds generating a high-quality solution. Since implementing this dispatch system in 2019, Meituan has realized a decrease of 20.96 % 20.96 % 20.96%20.96 \% in average order delivery time and 23.77 % 23.77 % 23.77%23.77 \% in average courier traveling distance per order. In addition, the system contributes to cost reductions of about $ 0.23 $ 0.23 $0.23\$ 0.23 billion annually. Moreover, the dispatch system enabled other new digital economy business formats, such as Meituan Instashopping and Meituan Grocery, to thrive.
美团在中国首创了按需外卖服务，允许消费者在线下单并实现快速送达。依托其分钟级配送网络并拥有超过五百万名活跃骑手，美团每天配送订单超过六千万单，在订单量和骑手数量方面位居世界首位。它已转型为中国最关键的配送基础设施提供者之一。为了履行对用户的服务承诺并改善骑手的工作体验，美团必须持续优化订单分配决策。因此，它开发了一个实时智能调度系统，其中包含一系列基于运筹学和机器学习技术的算法，能够在动态且不确定的环境中精确建模分配问题，并在数秒内求解这个 NP 难问题，生成高质量的解决方案。自 2019 年实施该调度系统以来，美团实现了平均订单配送时长减少 20.96 % 20.96 % 20.96%20.96 \% 、平均每单骑手行驶里程减少 23.77 % 23.77 % 23.77%23.77 \% 。此外，该系统每年还为公司带来了约 $ 0.23 $ 0.23 $0.23\$ 0.23 十亿元的成本节约。 此外，调度系统还使其他新的数字经济业态蓬勃发展，例如美团即时购和美团买菜。

Keywords: order assignment problem • pickup and delivery problem • multiobjective optimization problem • combinatorial optimization • graph representation learning - machine learning - inverse reinforcement learning - Edelman Award
关键词：派单问题 • 取送问题 • 多目标优化问题 • 组合优化 • 图表示学习 - 机器学习 - 逆向强化学习 - 艾德尔曼奖

Introduction  序言

In recent years, Meituan has pioneered an on-demand food delivery service in China, encompassing more than five million active couriers, covering more than 3,000 cities, providing more than 9.3 million merchants and 687 million consumers with a reliable and fast pickup and delivery process, and delivering more than 60 million orders each day. With a mere few clicks, consumers can enjoy delicious meals without leaving their homes, all delivered to their doorsteps within just a few dozen minutes. Meituan now holds the largest share of the Chinese on-demand food delivery market. Its minute-level delivery network has rapidly grown into the largest global one and evolved to be one of the most important domestic infrastructures in China.
近年来，美团在中国率先打造了按需外卖服务，拥有超过五百万活跃配送员，覆盖三千多座城市，为超过 930 万商户和 6.87 亿消费者提供可靠且快速的取送配送服务，每天配送订单超过六千万。消费者仅需轻点几下，就能在家中享用美味餐食，并在几十分钟内送上门。美团目前占据中国按需外卖市场的最大份额。其分钟级配送网络迅速发展成为全球最大，并演变为中国最重要的国内基础设施之一。
Consumers anywhere in China can use this service to place food orders. Accordingly, the dispatch system of the delivery platform collects newly placed orders, notifies the corresponding merchants, and then assigns the orders to couriers who are responsible for the pickup and delivery of the orders. Meanwhile, the assignment procedure must seek a sophisticated equilibrium to satisfy several key stakeholders involved in the delivery transactions: consumers want their food delivered within the promised delivery period, merchants hope their food is served fresh to satisfy their consumers, and couriers want to deliver a sufficient number of orders to allow them to make decent wages in a safe and stable environment. Figure 1 shows the overall process, including the platform and stakeholders involved in this on-demand food delivery service.
中国任何地方的消费者都可以使用该服务下单。因此，配送平台的调度系统会收集新下的订单，通知相应的商家，然后将订单分配给负责取货和配送的骑手。与此同时，分配过程必须寻求一个复杂的均衡，以满足参与配送交易的若干关键利益相关者：消费者希望他们的食物在承诺的送达时间内送达，商家希望食物新鲜上桌以满足消费者，骑手希望在安全稳定的环境中配送足够数量的订单以获得体面的收入。图 1 展示了整体流程，包括该按需餐饮配送服务中涉及的平台和利益相关者。
Figure 1: Figure 1. (Color online) Meituan's On-Demand Food Delivery Process, Which Includes Six Steps and Four Stakeholders (i.e., Consumer, Courier, Merchant, Platform)
图 1：图 1。（彩色在线）美团的按需餐饮配送流程，包含六个步骤和四类利益相关者（即消费者、骑手、商家、平台）
Note. (1) The consumer places an order on the platform, (2) the platform sends the order to the merchant and the merchant starts to prepare the food, (3) the platform generates routes for the order’s candidate couriers, (4) the platform assigns the order to an appropriate courier based on the generated routes, (5) the courier accepts the order and picks up the food, and (6) the courier delivers the food to the consumer.
注： (1) 用户在平台下单，(2) 平台将订单发送给商家，商家开始准备食物，(3) 平台为订单的候选骑手生成路线，(4) 平台基于生成的路线将订单分配给合适的骑手，(5) 骑手接单并取餐，(6) 骑手将食物送达用户。
In Chinese culture, food is the primary sustenance in people’s lives, and the assignment quality of the dispatch system greatly impacts the experiences of hundreds of millions of consumers. Moreover, the accumulated traveling distance of all the couriers in a given day equals the number of miles required to circle the earth approximately 1,500 times. High-quality assignments can effectively shorten couriers’ daily routes while providing them satisfactory incomes, and lead to a significant reduction in carbon emissions (couriers typically use e-bikes for their deliveries; in Appendix A, we provide the calculation of an e-bike carbon footprint). Therefore, improving the assignment quality of the dispatch system constitutes a critical objective for the delivery platform. Meituan addressed these challenges through technological and analytical innovations and developments. It built a real-time intelligent dispatch system to continuously improve the assignment quality.
在中国文化中，食物是人们生活的主要维持，派单系统的指派质量极大地影响着数亿消费者的体验。此外，在某一天内所有骑手的累计行驶里程约等于绕地球行驶约 1500 圈。高质量的指派可以有效缩短骑手的日常路线，同时为他们提供令人满意的收入，并显著减少碳排放（骑手通常使用电动自行车送餐；在附录 A 中，我们提供了电动自行车碳足迹的计算）。因此，提高派单系统的指派质量成为外卖平台的一项关键目标。美团通过技术和分析上的创新与发展应对了这些挑战，构建了一个实时智能派单系统，以持续提升指派质量。
In the past few years, the dispatch system has evolved through four phases (Figure 2). In the initial phase (i.e., Phase 0), which was the manual assignment of couriers to orders, experienced dispatchers assigned the orders. The system next enabled automatic assignments of couriers to orders, one-by-one sequentially (i.e., not leveraging parallel computing capabilities), in a greedy manner (i.e., Phase 1), which soon encountered severe service quality degradation and unacceptable computational time as the order volume grew rapidly. The platform then upgraded the system into an area-level batch assignment mode based on constructive heuristic methods (i.e., Phase 2); this met the real-time requirements (within 10 seconds) but failed to ensure the assignment quality (i.e., the satisfaction of all stakeholder interests) as the daily order volume increased. The system finally evolved into Phase 3, which realized citywide optimal order assignment (OA) via operations research (OR) and
在过去的几年里，派单系统经历了四个阶段的演变（图 2）。在最初的阶段（即阶段 0），由人工将骑手分配到订单上，有经验的调度员负责指派订单。随后系统实现了对骑手与订单的自动分配，以贪心方式逐一顺序分配（即不利用并行计算能力，称为阶段 1），但随着订单量快速增长，该方法很快导致服务质量严重下降且计算时间不可接受。平台随后将系统升级为基于构造性启发式方法的区域级批量分配模式（即阶段 2）；该模式满足了实时性要求（在 10 秒内），但随着日订单量的增加，未能保证分配质量（即无法同时满足所有利益相关者的利益）。系统最终演进到阶段 3，通过运筹学（OR）实现了全市范围的最优订单分配（OA）并
Figure 2: Figure 2. Evolution of the Dispatch System as the Order Volume Increased
图 2：图 2. 随着订单量增加派单系统的演进
machine learning (ML) techniques and served as the cornerstone to support more than 60 million orders each day. Meanwhile, the research and development group of the dispatch system grew into a team of 30 − 40 30 − 40 30-4030-40 people.
机器学习（ML）技术，并成为支撑每天超过 6000 万订单的基石。与此同时，调度系统的研发团队发展到 30 − 40 30 − 40 30-4030-40 人。
Practically, the dispatch procedures are executed every 30 seconds at a city level. At each dispatch period, the dispatch system requires three stages to generate highquality OA decisions (i.e., courier behavior estimation, courier candidate evaluation, and OA generation). The first two stages are used for modeling the OA problem, and the last stage is used to develop a high-quality assignment result. The dispatch procedure is shown in Figure 3.
在实际操作中，调度流程在城市级别每 30 秒执行一次。在每个调度周期，调度系统需要通过三个阶段来生成高质量的 OA 决策（即骑手行为估计、骑手候选评估和 OA 生成）。前两个阶段用于建模 OA 问题，最后一个阶段用于生成高质量的分配结果。调度流程如图 3 所示。
Specifically, in the courier behavior estimation stage, the system formulates and solves the courier’s pickup and delivery route planning (RP) problem assuming a new order is assigned, providing the evaluation basis of the next stage. In the courier candidate evaluation stage, it calculates the matching degree (MD) scores between each new order and available couriers, reflecting the requirements of each stakeholder. For example, “time score” represents the overtime severity (i.e., the extent to which the actual delivery time is later than the promised delivery time) of the order delivered by the courier, and “distance score” represents the total distance increase of the courier caused by the delivery of the order. O A O A OAO A generation focuses on
具体来说，在骑手行为估计阶段，系统在假设分配了新订单的情况下制定并求解骑手的取送货路线规划（RP）问题，为下一阶段提供评估依据。在骑手候选评估阶段，系统计算每个新订单与可用骑手之间的匹配度（MD）分数，反映各利益相关方的需求。例如，“时间分数”表示骑手配送该订单的超时严重程度（即实际送达时间晚于承诺送达时间的程度），而“距离分数”表示该订单导致的骑手总行驶距离增加量。 O A O A OAO A 生成侧重于
solving the many (order)-to-one (courier) assignment problem to optimize the global MD scores.
解决多（订单）对一（骑手）的指派问题，以优化全局 MD 分数。

Business Problem and Challenges Problem Overview
业务问题与挑战 问题概述

In essence, the sequential dispatch process for OA for one day, as Figure 4 shows, can be formulated as a multiperiod, multiobjective, combinatorial optimization problem, which we define in Equation (B.1) in Appendix A. The current period’s dispatch decisions affect the OA results in the subsequent dispatch period by changing the courier’s status. Furthermore, the platform pursues global spatial-temporal optimality, that is, optimizing the maximum MD score across all orders and the couriers assigned in an entire day: { ∑ t = 1 T F t o ∗ } o = 1 O ∑ t = 1 T   F t o ∗ o = 1 O {sum_(t=1)^(T)F_(t)^(o**)}_(o=1)^(O)\left\{\sum_{t=1}^{T} F_{t}^{o *}\right\}_{o=1}^{O}, instead of a single or a few dispatch periods, that is, { F t o ∗ } o = 1 O F t o ∗ o = 1 O {F_(t)^(o**)}_(o=1)^(O)\left\{F_{t}^{o *}\right\}_{o=1}^{O}. We provide explanations of the notation in Appendix B.
本质上，如图 4 所示，一天的 OA 顺序调度过程可以表述为一个多期、多目标、组合优化问题，我们在附录 A 的方程(B.1)中给出定义。当前时段的调度决策通过改变骑手的状态影响后续调度时段的 OA 结果。此外，平台追求全局时空最优，即优化全天所有订单及被分配骑手的最大 MD 得分： { ∑ t = 1 T F t o ∗ } o = 1 O ∑ t = 1 T   F t o ∗ o = 1 O {sum_(t=1)^(T)F_(t)^(o**)}_(o=1)^(O)\left\{\sum_{t=1}^{T} F_{t}^{o *}\right\}_{o=1}^{O} ，而不是单一或少数调度时段，即 { F t o ∗ } o = 1 O F t o ∗ o = 1 O {F_(t)^(o**)}_(o=1)^(O)\left\{F_{t}^{o *}\right\}_{o=1}^{O} 。符号说明见附录 B。

Technical Challenges  技术挑战

Modeling and solving the above multiperiod, multiobjective decision problem in real time proved to be a challenging task. Consistent with the characteristics of on-demand food delivery service and OA problems, the technical challenges we encountered are as follows:
实时建模并求解上述多期、多目标决策问题被证明是一个具有挑战性的任务。与按需餐饮配送服务和 OA 问题的特点一致，我们遇到的技术挑战如下：
Figure 3: Figure 3. Dispatch Procedure, Which Is Implemented Every 30 Seconds at a City Level
图 3：图 3。在城市层面每 30 秒执行一次的调度流程
Note. (1) Courier behavior estimation formulates and solves the courier’s route planning problem, providing an evaluation basis for the next stage; (2) courier candidate evaluation calculates the matching degree scores between the new orders and couriers based on the results of Step (1); and (3) order assignment generation formulates and solves the order assignment problem to optimize the global matching degree scores, satisfying each stakeholder.
注： (1) 骑手行为估计对骑手的路线规划问题进行建模与求解，为下一阶段提供评估依据；(2) 骑手候选评估基于步骤（1）的结果计算新订单与骑手之间的匹配度分数；(3) 订单分配生成对订单分配问题进行建模与求解，以优化全局匹配度分数，满足各利益相关方。
Figure 4: Figure 4. (Color online) Sequential Dispatch Process
图 4：图 4。（彩色在线）顺序调度流程
Note. At each dispatch period, the dispatch system collects newly arrived orders and the status of available couriers and determines the best match between them.
注：在每个调度周期，调度系统收集新到达的订单和可用骑手的状态，并确定二者之间的最佳匹配。
Dynamic and Sequential Decision Process. In our setting, dispatch is a dynamic and sequential decision process, which executes every 30 seconds at a city level (Figure 4). At each dispatch moment, the system collects the newly arrived orders and the status of available couriers, and then determines the best matching of the orders and available couriers. Because the system pursues global spatial-temporal optimality and the matching results of the current period will directly affect the results in subsequent periods, considering the influence of future information in the subsequent time steps is necessary to avoid greedy decisions and achieve long-term global optima.
动态与序贯决策过程。在我们的设定中，调度是一个动态的序贯决策过程，在城市维度每 30 秒执行一次（图 4）。在每次调度时刻，系统会收集新到的订单和可用配送员的状态，然后确定订单与可用配送员的最佳匹配。因为系统追求全局时空最优，而且当前时段的匹配结果会直接影响后续时段的结果，所以必须考虑后续时间步中未来信息的影响，以避免贪婪决策并实现长期的全局最优。
However, predicting the future is difficult. The exact distributions of orders and courier status in the future, as well as the behavior of the couriers and the realworld environment are full of uncertainties, which further complicate the problem. Although we could use a simulation approach to address the uncertainties, building a highly precise simulation system is expensive both financially and computationally and therefore difficult in our setting.
然而，预测未来是困难的。未来订单和配送员状态的精确分布，以及配送员行为和现实环境充满不确定性，这进一步使问题复杂化。尽管我们可以使用仿真方法来应对不确定性，但构建一个高精度的仿真系统在财务和计算上代价都很高，因此在我们的场景中难以实现。
Balancing Multiple Objectives. As we describe previously, OA should balance the goals of the various stakeholders. Consumers want to receive their food on time and exactly as ordered, merchants need the food to be served fresh to satisfy their consumers, couriers need to
平衡多重目标。正如我们之前所述，OA 应在各相关方的目标之间取得平衡。消费者希望按时并准确收到他们的餐点，商家需要食物保持新鲜以满足顾客，骑手则需要
deliver a sufficient number of orders to allow them to make decent wages, and the platform’s goal is to operate the delivery service efficiently.
为配送员提供足够的订单以获得体面的收入，同时平台的目标是高效地运营配送服务。
These dispatch objectives should be precisely modeled in the MD scores between orders and couriers, and accurately calculated in the dispatch procedure. Meanwhile, tradeoffs among these objectives should be made carefully to achieve long-term optimality of the entire system and all the stakeholders.
这些派单目标应在订单与骑手之间的 MD 分数中被精确建模，并在派单过程中被准确计算。同时，应在这些目标之间谨慎权衡，以实现整个系统及所有利益相关者的长期最优。
A common method used to address these multiobjective problems is to combine the multiple objectives into a single combined objective using weights, a technique referred to as a scalarization method (Gunantara 2018). However, finding and calibrating the appropriate weights for different objectives is laborious and nontrivial. The relative scales of the different objectives change dramatically during the various periods of each day. For example, couriers may deliver many more orders during peak hours compared with off-peak hours, which can cause enormous differences in the objectives. Thus, the weights should be adaptively updated to ensure long-term optimality. However, theoretical methods to guide the selection of such weights and guarantee longterm optimality are lacking, especially in such an online and dynamic setting.
一种常用的方法是将多个目标用权重合并为一个组合目标，这种技术称为标量化方法（Gunantara 2018）。然而，为不同目标寻找和校准合适的权重既费力又不简单。不同目标的相对尺度在每天的不同时间段会发生巨大变化。例如，与非高峰期相比，高峰时段快递员可能会配送更多订单，这会导致目标之间出现巨大差异。因此，权重应当自适应更新以确保长期最优。然而，指导此类权重选择并保证长期最优性的理论方法尚缺乏，尤其是在如此在线且动态的环境中。
Uncertainty. Uncertainty is an inevitable characteristic of the food delivery process. Unexpected events (e.g.,
不确定性。不确定性是食品配送过程不可避免的特征。意外事件（例如、
traffic jams), extended food preparation time by the merchants, and couriers’ personal preferences (e.g., some couriers prefer orders in business district A and some prefer business district B) will greatly affect couriers’ behaviors and the service quality of the related orders. However, the system can neither eliminate nor accurately predict these uncertainties. Moreover, the lack of adequate real-time monitoring of the status of couriers and merchants further increases the uncertainties.
交通拥堵、商家延长备餐时间以及骑手的个人偏好（例如有些骑手偏好 A 商圈的订单，有些偏好 B 商圈的订单）都会大大影响骑手的行为和相关订单的服务质量。然而，系统既无法消除这些不确定性，也无法准确预测它们。此外，缺乏对骑手和商家状态的充分实时监控进一步增加了不确定性。
As a result of these uncertainties, the system cannot make accurate point estimations on couriers’ behaviors, for example, when the courier will pick up or deliver the order. Modeling the MD score and making dispatch decisions based on the results of inaccurate estimation will weaken the effectiveness of dispatch decisions, thereby affecting the experiences of consumers, couriers, and merchants. As an example, if the merchant is slow in preparing the food, the courier must wait in the restaurant until it is ready, which may cause the courier’s subsequent orders to be late and result in a conflict between the courier and the merchant. In addition, the impact of uncertainties will be further intensified by the courier’s current workload and external factors such as inclement weather.
由于这些不确定性，系统无法对骑手的行为做出准确的点估计，例如骑手何时取餐或完成配送。对 MD 分数建模并基于不准确估计的结果做派单决策，会削弱派单决策的有效性，从而影响消费者、骑手和商家的体验。例如，如果商家备餐较慢，骑手必须在餐厅等待直到餐品准备好，这可能导致骑手后续订单延误并引发骑手与商家之间的冲突。此外，骑手当前的工作负载以及恶劣天气等外部因素会进一步加剧这些不确定性的影响。
Solving a Large-Scale NP-Hard Integer Programming Problem in Real Time. For each dispatch period, the many-to-one assignment problem is NP-hard. In our application, couriers are often assigned multiple orders for one delivery route, sometimes as many as five orders during the noon peak. Hence, the scale of our problem is significantly larger than a one-to-one problem. For example, the number of decision variables for a one-to-one assignment problem with N N NN assignment objects is in the order of N 2 N 2 N^(2)N^{2}, whereas the number of decision variables for a five-to-one assignment problem with N N NN assignment objects is in the order of N 6 N 6 N^(6)N^{6}. Furthermore, the MD scores between the couriers and orders are nonadditive; that is, the MD score of assigning several orders simultaneously to a courier is not equal to the sum of the MD scores of assigning the orders separately to the same courier. However, computing the MD scores of arbitrary order combinations and the couriers is unrealistic, especially in a real-time environment, which results in additional challenges to algorithm design.
实时求解大规模 NP-难整数规划问题。对于每个派单周期，多对一指派问题是 NP-难的。在我们的应用中，骑手通常在一次配送路径上被分配多个订单，在午高峰时甚至多达五个订单。因此，我们问题的规模远大于一对一问题。例如，具有 N N NN 个指派对象的一对一指派问题的决策变量数大约为 N 2 N 2 N^(2)N^{2} 量级，而具有 N N NN 个指派对象的五对一指派问题的决策变量数大约为 N 6 N 6 N^(6)N^{6} 量级。此外，骑手与订单之间的 MD 分数是非可加的；也就是说，同时将若干订单指派给同一骑手的 MD 分数，并不等于将这些订单分别指派给同一骑手的 MD 分数之和。然而，计算任意订单组合与骑手之间的 MD 分数在现实中尤其是在实时环境下是不切实际的，这给算法设计带来了额外的挑战。
Couriers usually travel rapidly; therefore, the OA problem must be solved in less than 10 seconds to ensure assignment quality, keeping the courier status (e.g., location and on-hand order number) unchanged during the information acquisition period and assignment generation period. Traditional supply chain optimization problems, although they may require large-scale search spaces, do not require immediate solutions; multiplehour solutions are permissible. Thus, their methods cannot be adopted directly for on-demand delivery.
快递员通常移动速度快；因此，为确保指派质量，OA 问题必须在 10 秒内解决，在信息获取期和指派生成期内保持快递员状态（例如位置和手持订单数量）不变。传统的供应链优化问题虽然可能需要大规模的搜索空间，但不要求即时得到解；允许数小时的求解时间。因此，其方法不能直接用于按需配送。

Technical Solution  技术方案

Algorithm Structure of the Dispatch System
调度系统的算法结构

To resolve the previous challenges, the dispatch system first decomposes the original multiperiod, multiobjective stochastic assignment problem into a series of single-period, single-objective deterministic subproblems, which can be solved independently at each dispatch moment through weight and MD score design; see Equation (B.2) in Appendix A. Then it applies effective algorithms for solving the subproblem via OR methods and ML techniques to obtain a high-quality solution with superior computational efficiency. At each dispatch period, the algorithm is executed as follows:
为解决上述挑战，调度系统首先将原始的多时段、多目标随机指派问题分解为一系列单时段、单目标的确定性子问题，这些子问题可通过权重和 MD 评分设计在每次调度时独立求解；见附录 A 中的等式(B.2)。然后，它结合运筹方法和机器学习技术应用有效算法来求解该子问题，以在优越的计算效率下获得高质量解。在每个调度周期，算法按如下方式执行：
In the courier behavior estimation stage, we update the modeling and solution methods of the local courier’s RP problem, to continuously improve the route consistency rate between the planning routes from the solutions and the real ones that couriers actually follow in an uncertain and time-varying environment. It provides a reliable evaluation basis for the evaluation stage.
在快递员行为估计阶段，我们更新了本地快递员路径规划（RP）问题的建模和求解方法，以在不确定且时变的环境中持续提高规划路线与快递员实际遵循路线之间的一致性率。这为评估阶段提供了可靠的评估依据。
In the courier candidate evaluation stage, the system adopts an online weight adaptation mechanism realizing the temporal decomposition and multiobjective integration. It aims to guide the system states gradually evolving into an acceptable long-term balance among each objective. In addition, the system utilizes a robust and adaptive M D M D MDM D score calculation method to address the challenges due to the uncertainty in the delivery process. Hence, it transforms the OA problem at each dispatch moment into a single-objective, deterministic problem.
在快递员候选评估阶段，系统采用在线权重自适应机制，实现时间分解与多目标整合，旨在引导系统状态逐步演化为各目标之间可接受的长期平衡。此外，系统利用一种鲁棒且自适应的 M D M D MDM D 分数计算方法，以应对配送过程中的不确定性带来的挑战。因此，它将每次派单时刻的 OA 问题转化为单目标、确定性的问题。
In the O A O A OAO A generation stage, we update the algorithm for solving many-to-one assignment problem to continuously improve the solution quality and computational efficiency. In addition to traditional OR methods, we adopt ML techniques to enhance the algorithm performance. For example, we effectively prune the search space and significantly improve the algorithm (for both the solution quality and computational efficiency), via graph neural network (GNN) methods to learn effective order combinations from experienced couriers’ behaviors.
在 O A O A OAO A 代生成阶段，我们更新了解决多对一指派问题的算法，以持续提升解的质量和计算效率。除了传统的运筹学方法外，我们还采用机器学习技术来增强算法性能。例如，我们通过图神经网络（GNN）方法学习经验丰富骑手的有效接单组合，有效剪枝搜索空间，从而显著提升算法的性能（包括解的质量和计算效率）。
Figure 5 shows the execution of the dispatch algorithm at each period. We cannot compute the MD scores between every order combination and courier due to computational complexity; therefore, we execute the behavior estimation and evaluation of the courier candidates for some promising order combinations, which are determined by the search mechanism of the algorithm, at each iteration.
图 5 展示了调度算法在每个时段的执行过程。由于计算复杂度，我们无法对每一个订单组合与骑手之间计算 MD 评分；因此，我们在每次迭代中，仅对由算法搜索机制确定的一些有前景的订单组合执行骑手候选的行为估计和评估。
Here we introduce the major algorithm components of the dispatch system.
下面我们介绍调度系统的主要算法组件。

Route Planning: Domain Refined Heuristics with Inverse Reinforcement Learning
路径规划：基于领域精炼启发式与逆向强化学习

To tackle these challenges, we designed a domainrefined heuristic search with inverse reinforcement learning
为应对这些挑战，我们设计了一个结合逆向强化学习的领域细化启发式搜索

(IRL) for RP. The heuristic search (Zheng et al. 2019) finds optimal solutions for the RP with delivery time constraints, given a specific optimization objective. The optimization objective, which directly determines the RP result, is learned from couriers’ historical pickup and delivery routes to improve the route consistency rate between the planning routes and the real routes, as we explain in more detail below.
（IRL）用于路径规划。启发式搜索（Zheng et al. 2019）在给定特定优化目标的情况下，为带有送达时间约束的路径规划问题找到最优解。该优化目标直接决定路径规划的结果，它是从骑手的历史取件和派送路线中学习得到的，以提高规划路线与实际路线之间的一致率，下面我们将对此做更详细的说明。
Heuristic Search-Based Route Planning. The heuristic search in our system is a two-stage, fast heuristic method (Zheng et al. 2019), including an initialization stage and a local search stage. Its objective is to find the optimal route that minimizes a specific optimization objective g ( r ) g ( r ) g(r)g(r), where r r rr is the pickup and delivery route, and g g gg is the objective function. This search problem has two main constraints, a precedence constraint (i.e., each order must be picked up before being delivered) and a capacity constraint (i.e., the orders should not exceed the total delivery capacity of a courier).
基于启发式搜索的路径规划。我们系统中的启发式搜索是一种两阶段的快速启发式方法（Zheng et al. 2019），包括初始化阶段和局部搜索阶段。其目标是找到使特定优化目标最小化的最优路线 g ( r ) g ( r ) g(r)g(r) ，其中 r r rr 为取件与派送路线， g g gg 为目标函数。该搜索问题有两个主要约束：先后约束（即每个订单必须在派送前先被取件）和容量约束（即订单数量不得超过骑手的总配送承载能力）。
The initialization stage uses a greedy insertion procedure. We first sort the orders according to their estimated times of arrival (ETAs) and then insert the pickup and delivery points of each order sequentially and greedily. This greedy insertion provides an initial solution for the RP.
初始化阶段使用贪心插入过程。我们首先根据订单的预计到达时间（ETA）对订单进行排序，然后按顺序对每笔订单的取货点和送达点进行逐一贪心插入。该贪心插入为路径规划（RP）提供了初始解。
The local search stage is an optimization procedure based on the initial solution. We attempt to move delivery points with delays either forward or backward. As Figure 7 illustrates, on the left, we find the delivery point that provides the most time ahead of its ETA and we try to move it backward to find a better solution (where the objective value is lower). On the right, we try to move forward the point with the most delays. The solutions
局部搜索阶段是在初始解基础上的一种优化过程。我们尝试将存在延误的配送点向前或向后移动。如图 7 所示，左侧我们找到在预计到达时间（ETA）之前提供最多提前时间的配送点，尝试将其向后移动以寻找更优的解（即目标值更低）。右侧我们尝试将延误最多的配送点向前移动。这些解

Through these two stages, we can successfully reach the global optima (which are obtained by exact algorithms in an offline fashion) within 10 milliseconds in 97 % 97 % 97%97 \% of the cases.
通过这两个阶段，我们可以在 97 % 97 % 97%97 \% 的情况下在 10 毫秒内成功达到全局最优（该最优由离线精确算法获得）。
Route Planning Objective Function Learning with IRL. Proper modeling of the RP objective function directly determines the solution quality and reliability. Initially, we can set up a manually defined function based on the delivery distance and the time that exceeds the ETA (Zheng et al. 2019). However, it is obvious that the manual function cannot determine how couriers make decisions during the delivery process. Therefore, the probability that couriers will not be able to deliver orders by the expected time and that the planned routes are unusable is fairly high, especially in an uncertain and time-varying environment (i.e., an environment in which the order and courier distribution vary from time to time).
使用逆向强化学习进行路径规划目标函数学习。对路径规划目标函数的恰当建模直接决定了解决方案的质量和可靠性。最初，我们可以基于配送距离和超过到达预期时间（ETA）的时长来设置一个手工定义的函数（Zheng et al. 2019）。然而，很明显，手工函数无法确定配送员在配送过程中如何做出决策。因此，在不确定且随时间变化的环境中（即订单和配送员分布随时间变化的环境），配送员无法按预期时间完成派送以及规划路线不可用的概率相当高。
To ensure the consistency between planned routes and the couriers’ actual delivery routes, we propose to learn the objective function from courier historical delivery routes. Specifically, a feature-based maximum entropy
为确保规划路线与配送员实际配送路线的一致性，我们提出从配送员的历史配送路线中学习目标函数。具体来说，基于特征的最大熵
(MaxEnt) IRL (Ziebart et al. 2008, Kuderer et al. 2015, Finn et al. 2016) is used to learn a reward function (objective function g ( r ) g ( r ) g(r)g(r) in our case) from courier historical delivery routes.
（MaxEnt）逆向强化学习（Ziebart et al. 2008，Kuderer et al. 2015，Finn et al. 2016）被用来从配送员的历史配送路线中学习一个回报函数（在我们的情形中即目标函数 g ( r ) g ( r ) g(r)g(r) ）。

has completed, all possible delivery routes are added to a candidate route set. We extract features from these routes and learn the best parameter θ θ theta\theta, which maximizes the probability of the route that the courier employs in the reality. The parameter θ θ theta\theta is then updated and used in the next run of the heuristic search. A fixed number of iterations and early stopping criteria can be used in the training phase, considering the training data set size. In practice, two main considerations are the feature representation of the route and the rationality of using the candidate route set in IRL. For the feature representation of the route, we use four kinds of route features based on our domain knowledge, namely, delivery distance, delivery time, route complexity, and courier’s route preference. For example, we use the total navigation/line distance and the average navigation/line distance for pickup/delivery points in our implementation. For rationality of the candidate route set, we should sample all possible routes in an ideal IRL setting, although this becomes infeasible as the number of orders increases. Instead, we take advantage of the information in the local search stage of the heuristic search. Because we attempt to move points forward or backward in the local search, rich temporary routes (ranging from a few to about a hundred in our data set) can be generated for a single training sample. This temporary route set can cover more than 90 % 90 % 90%90 \% of a courier’s real route. In that case, we treat this set as the possible route set R R RR and replenish it by adding new routes during the training phase.
完成后，所有可能的配送路线都会被加入到候选路线集合中。我们从这些路线中提取特征并学习最佳参数 θ θ theta\theta ，该参数使快递员在现实中采用的路线的概率最大化。然后更新参数 θ θ theta\theta 并在下一次启发式搜索运行中使用它。考虑到训练数据集的大小，训练阶段可以使用固定次数的迭代和提前停止准则。实际上，有两个主要考虑因素：路线的特征表示以及在逆向强化学习（IRL）中使用候选路线集合的合理性。关于路线的特征表示，我们基于领域知识使用了四类路线特征，分别是配送距离、配送时间、路线复杂度和快递员的路线偏好。例如，在实现中我们使用了总导航/直线距离以及取货/送货点的平均导航/直线距离。关于候选路线集合的合理性，在理想的 IRL 设置下我们应该对所有可能的路线进行采样，尽管随着订单数量增加这变得不可行。 相反，我们利用启发式搜索的局部搜索阶段中的信息。因为在局部搜索中我们尝试将点向前或向后移动，所以对于单个训练样本可以生成丰富的临时路线（在我们的数据集中从几个到大约一百条不等）。这个临时路线集合可以覆盖快递员真实路线的超过 2%。在这种情况下，我们将该集合视为可能路线集合，并在训练阶段通过添加新路线对其进行补充。
Through IRL, we provide a learning solution for the objective function in the heuristic search-based RP. Additionally, we develop our RP algorithm as a Java package, which serves the system using several clusters.
通过逆强化学习（IRL），我们为基于启发式搜索的路径规划问题提供了一个目标函数的学习解决方案。此外，我们将路径规划算法开发为一个 Java 包，并在多个集群上为系统提供服务。

Matching Degree Score Calculation: Adaptive Risk Decision Making Through Bayesian Optimization
匹配度评分计算：通过贝叶斯优化进行自适应风险决策

Considering the inevitable uncertainties of the delivery process and the impact of resulting invalid dispatch decisions, we introduce a risk management approach to improve decision effectiveness and the robustness of the resulting solution. The couriers’ performance, such as on-time rate and delivery efficiency, reflected by the MD score, follows a probability distribution. The worst-case risk of the distribution can be quantified by the conditional value-at-risk (CVaR) (Tamar et al. 2015), which is a statistical risk measure widely used in both practice and theory. The average of the performance distribution is crucial under normal circumstances. Therefore, the MD score should comprehensively consider the courier’s performance in both high-risk ( f e f e f^(e)f^{e} ) and average ( f r f r f^(r)f^{r} ) system states, as we show in Equation (3), where α ∈ ( 0 , 1 ) α ∈ ( 0 , 1 ) alpha in(0,1)\alpha \in(0,1) denotes the degree of risk aversion:
考虑到配送过程不可避免的不确定性及由此导致的无效派单决策的影响，我们引入了一种风险管理方法以提高决策的有效性和所得解的鲁棒性。骑手的绩效（如准时率和送达效率），由 MD 分数反映，服从一个概率分布。该分布的最坏情形风险可以用条件在险价值（CVaR）（Tamar 等，2015）量化，CVaR 是在实践和理论中广泛使用的统计风险度量。在常态情况下，绩效分布的均值也极为重要。因此，MD 分数应当在高风险（ f e f e f^(e)f^{e} ）和平均（ f r f r f^(r)f^{r} ）系统状态下综合考虑骑手绩效，正如我们在式（3）中所示，其中 α ∈ ( 0 , 1 ) α ∈ ( 0 , 1 ) alpha in(0,1)\alpha \in(0,1) 表示风险规避程度：
f = ( 1 − α ) f e + α f r f = ( 1 − α ) f e + α f r f=(1-alpha)f^(e)+alphaf^(r)f=(1-\alpha) f^{e}+\alpha f^{r}
Accordingly, there are two major challenges in MD score evaluation. On one hand, real-time decision making must be completed in milliseconds; however, the calculation of risk measures involves large-scale sampling and repeated RP calculations for each sample. An effective sampling method should be adopted to reduce complexity and simultaneously guarantee the accuracy of the calculation of tail risk. On the other hand, the system has different risk attitudes in different scenarios. Specifically, during the peak lunch hours or under extreme weather conditions, the system tends to adopt a more risk-averse approach, and vice versa. Realizing risk aversion degree adaptation (i.e., tailoring the degree of risk aversion to
因此，MD 评分评估面临两大挑战。一方面，实时决策必须在毫秒内完成；然而，风险度量的计算涉及大规模采样并对每个样本反复进行 RP 计算。应采用有效的采样方法以降低复杂度，同时保证尾部风险计算的准确性。另一方面，系统在不同场景下具有不同的风险偏好。具体而言，在午餐高峰或极端天气条件下，系统倾向于采取更厌恶风险的策略，反之亦然。实现风险厌恶程度的自适应（即根据场景调整厌恶风险的程度）
changing contexts) with minimum trial-and-error cost online is also critical.
在在线环境中以最低的试错成本应对变化的情境也至关重要。
The MD score evaluation process can be divided into two parts:
MD 分数评估过程可以分为两部分：
Calculation of Risk Measures. Without loss of generality, we only take the uncertainties of the meal preparation time into account. As Figure 9 shows, assume a courier is assigned L L LL orders in total, and the mealtime of the l l ll th pickup node, denoted as t m l t m l t_(ml)t_{m l}, follows an independent distribution denoted as h m l ( t ) h m l ( t ) h_(ml)(t)h_{m l}(t). First, we adopt online layered sampling (Ding and Wang 2020) for each mealtime to satisfy the requirement for a millisecondlevel calculation. Next, considering that the execution times of nodes in sequence are highly correlated with each other, we integrate the pointwise mealtime samples into route samples through route construction. The total overtime interval of each route sample can then be separately evaluated as MD score samples. Finally, the MD score samples are aggregated into risk measures under two states (i.e., the high-risk state and the average state). Given the risk percentage β β beta\beta and the number of samples N N NN, the CVaR of scores (i.e., f r f r f^(r)f^{r} ) is approximated by averaging the worst β N β N beta N\beta N MD score samples, and f e f e f^(e)f^{e} is obtained by averaging all MD score samples.
风险度量的计算。在不失一般性的前提下，我们仅考虑配餐时间的不确定性。如图 9 所示，假设骑手总共被分配了 L L LL 个订单，第 l l ll 个取餐点的配餐时间记为 t m l t m l t_(ml)t_{m l} ，服从独立分布 h m l ( t ) h m l ( t ) h_(ml)(t)h_{m l}(t) 。首先，我们对每个配餐时间采用在线分层抽样（Ding and Wang 2020），以满足毫秒级计算的需求。接着，考虑到序列中节点的执行时间彼此高度相关，我们通过路线构建将逐点的配餐时间样本整合为路线样本。随后，可对每个路线样本的总超时区间分别评估为 MD 得分样本。最后，将 MD 得分样本在两种状态（即高风险状态和平均状态）下聚合为风险度量。给定风险百分比 β β beta\beta 和样本数量 N N NN ，得分的 CVaR（即 f r f r f^(r)f^{r} ）通过对最差的 β N β N beta N\beta N 个 MD 得分样本取平均来近似，而 f e f e f^(e)f^{e} 则通过对所有 MD 得分样本取平均得到。
Risk Aversion Degree Adaptation. In practice, the system may have different risk preferences for uncertainties
风险规避程度自适应。在实际应用中，系统在不同的运营场景下可能对不确定性有不同的风险偏好。
in different operational scenarios. We need to adapt the risk aversion degree to actual operational scenarios according to the near-real-time performance feedback. However, the mapping function between the risk aversion degree and the performance indicators of interest (e.g., on-time rate, travel distance) under the uncertain and time-varying environment does not assume any specific analytical functional forms. Therefore, we introduce the concept of black-box optimization (Frazier 2018), which refers to a type of problem where the objective function and constraints are not explicitly known or defined, and the optimization algorithm can only interact with the black box by providing input values and receiving corresponding output values. We adopted Bayesian optimization, as one of the most commonly used black-box optimization algorithms, in our system.
我们需要根据近实时的性能反馈将风险规避程度适配到实际运营场景。然而，在不确定且时变的环境下，风险规避程度与关注的性能指标（例如准时率、行驶距离）之间的映射函数并不假定任何具体的解析函数形式。因此，我们引入了黑箱优化（Frazier 2018）的概念，指的是目标函数和约束并未被明确知道或定义，优化算法只能通过向黑箱提供输入值并接收相应的输出值来与之交互。我们在系统中采用了贝叶斯优化，作为最常用的黑箱优化算法之一。
As Figure 10 shows, in the offline training phase, we choose a Gaussian process (GP) model to fit the probabilistic mapping function. In the online decisionmaking phase, we build the model input for each risk aversion degree in the candidate set, together with environmental context and time series variables, and run the GP model. The outputs are expressed as the mean and variance of the online performance indicators to be optimized. The best risk aversion degree for the next observation period (i.e., every 30 minutes in practice) is selected based on the upper confidence bound (UCB) (Contal et al. 2013) criterion, with the principle of
如图 10 所示，在离线训练阶段，我们选择高斯过程（GP）模型来拟合概率映射函数。在在线决策阶段，我们为候选集合中每个风险厌恶程度构建模型输入，连同环境上下文和时间序列变量，一并运行 GP 模型。输出表示为需优化的在线性能指标的均值和方差。下一个观测周期（即实际中每 30 分钟）最优的风险厌恶程度基于上置信界（UCB）（Contal et al. 2013）准则选择，其原则为

delivery experience and efficiency balance. At the end of each observation period, the performance indicators of interest evolve to new states and the model is updated accordingly. This method can obtain the desired MD score with minimum trial-and-error cost and ensure the stability and decision feasibility of the online dispatch system.
交付体验与效率的平衡。在每个观察期结束时，关注的性能指标会演化到新的状态，模型也会相应更新。该方法能够以最小的反复试错成本获得期望的 MD 评分，并保证线上调度系统的稳定性和决策可行性。
Our decision-making system with risk aversion degree adaptation has undergone A / B A / B A//B\mathrm{A} / \mathrm{B} testing in nine cities across China, each lasting for at least two weeks, where the optimal MD score of each time period fluctuates between 0.5 and 0.95 . Evaluation results of the testing showed that the on-time rate increased by 0.27 percentage points (pp), and the average travel distance was reduced by 1.20 % 1.20 % 1.20%1.20 \%.
我们带有风险厌恶度自适应的决策系统已在中国九个城市进行过 A / B A / B A//B\mathrm{A} / \mathrm{B} 次测试，每次持续至少两周，各时间段的最优 MD 评分在 0.5 到 0.95 之间波动。测试评估结果显示，准时率提高了 0.27 个百分点（pp），平均行驶距离减少了 1.20 % 1.20 % 1.20%1.20 \% 。

Dynamic Objective Weight Adaptation: Combining Online Decision Making with Offline Planning
动态目标权重自适应：将在线决策与离线规划相结合

To balance different dispatch goals, we implemented a target-oriented, multiobjective balancing framework inspired by Lyu et al. (2019) to adaptively adjust the weights of different objectives, such as courier efficiency and consumer experience, during the sequential dispatch process.
为平衡不同的调度目标，我们参考 Lyu et al. (2019) 实施了一个以目标为导向的多目标平衡框架，以在序贯调度过程中自适应地调整不同目标（如骑手效率与消费者体验）的权重。
We first obtain from historical operational data the “ideal point,” which represents a desired or highly acceptable value of each objective we seek for the long term and serves as the evolving target of the system during the entire dispatch process. Then we adjust the weight of each objective based on the gap between the objective’s current value and corresponding target value at each dispatch period, with the goal of decomposing the original assignment problem into independent single-period problems and guiding the system states to finally converge to a solution nearest to the target.
我们首先从历史运营数据中获取“理想点”，它代表我们长期追求的每个目标的期望值或高度可接受的值，并在整个调度过程中作为系统不断演进的目标。然后，我们根据每个调度时段中目标的当前值与相应目标值之间的差距来调整各目标的权重，目的是将原始分配问题分解为独立的单期问题，并引导系统状态最终收敛到最接近该目标的解。
Because the values of the objectives change dramatically over the daily horizon, as we explain earlier, we
正如我们之前所解释的，由于这些目标的取值在日内周期性变化幅度较大，我们
divide each day into a series of dispatch periods; U p t o U p t o U_(p_(t))^(o)U_{p_{t}}^{o} is the “ideal point” of objective o o oo during dispatch period p t p t p_(t)p_{t}, where time step t t tt is in period p t p t p_(t)p_{t}.
将每一天划分为一系列调度时段； U p t o U p t o U_(p_(t))^(o)U_{p_{t}}^{o} 是调度时段 p t p t p_(t)p_{t} 中目标 o o oo 的“理想点”，其中时间步 t t tt 位于时段 p t p t p_(t)p_{t} 。

Figure 11 illustrates our current implementation. The ideal point is generated based on the performance of historical dispatch decisions. The objective values of historical decisions are averaged by cities and periods, where a filtering mechanism is also implemented to reduce the noise in historical data. Then, offsets are added to the average historical values to provide overall guidance for the dispatch process. These offsets can be tuned to suit the preferences of decision makers to accommodate different objectives. For example, if one objective is more important, we can add a larger offset to this objective, which can increase its weight during online dispatching.
图 11 说明了我们当前的实现。理想点是基于历史派单决策的表现生成的。历史决策的目标值按城市和时间段进行平均，同时也实现了一个过滤机制以减少历史数据中的噪声。然后，在平均的历史值上加上偏移量，为派单过程提供整体性指导。这些偏移量可以调整以适应决策者的偏好，从而兼顾不同的目标。例如，如果某个目标更重要，我们可以对该目标加上更大的偏移量，从而在在线派单时增加其权重。
We implemented this framework in the dispatch system and conducted A / B A / B A//B\mathrm{A} / \mathrm{B} testing to measure its performance. When we tested it in five cities in China, each lasting for at least two weeks, the on-time rate increased by 0.33 percentage points (pp), and the average travel distance decreased by 0.92 % 0.92 % 0.92%0.92 \%. During this testing, the daily cumulative MD score of the experimental group improved by 3.6 % − 4.5 % 3.6 % − 4.5 % 3.6%-4.5%3.6 \%-4.5 \%.
我们在派单系统中实现了该框架并进行了 A / B A / B A//B\mathrm{A} / \mathrm{B} 测试以评估其性能。当我们在中国五个城市进行测试，每个城市持续至少两周时，准时率提高了 0.33 个百分点（pp），平均行驶距离减少了 0.92 % 0.92 % 0.92%0.92 \% 。在这次测试期间，实验组的日累计 MD 分数提高了 3.6 % − 4.5 % 3.6 % − 4.5 % 3.6%-4.5%3.6 \%-4.5 \% 。

Order Assignment: Operations Research Combined with Machine Learning
订单分配：运筹学与机器学习相结合

The solution quality and computational efficiency of the OA algorithm are important. The dispatch system uses
OA 算法的解质量和计算效率非常重要。派单系统使用
Figure 10: Figure 11. (Color online) Implementation of the Multiobjective Balancing Framework
图 10：图 11。（彩色在线）多目标平衡框架的实现
Notes. The “ideal point” is generated based on the performance of historical dispatch decisions and provided as offline features to the dispatch system. The dynamic weights are transferred as real-time features between different dispatch moments. During each dispatch moment, the gaps between current objective values and ideal points are measured and used to update the objective weights.
注释。“理想点”基于历史派单决策的表现生成，并作为离线特征提供给派单系统。动态权重作为实时特征在不同派单时刻间传递。在每次派单时刻，测量当前目标值与理想点之间的差距，并用以更新目标权重。
traditional OR methods in conjunction with ML techniques for OA and uses several techniques to optimize the OA algorithm performance.
将传统运筹学方法与用于 OA 的机器学习技术相结合，并使用多种技术来优化 OA 算法的性能。
Method 1: “Divide-and-Conquer” Framework with Imitation Learning and a GNN Algorithm Framework. To solve the many-to-one assignment problems in a realtime manner, the dispatch system employs an enhanced divide-and-conquer solution framework, in which it decomposes the original large-scale many-to-one assignment problem at each dispatch moment into a series of one-to-one subproblems, which are solved sequentially, resulting in a progressive online solution process. Each subproblem is simple and can be solved in polynomial time, thus greatly reducing the computational burden. To guarantee solution quality, the decomposition and iteration rounds are carefully guided and controlled by a global coordinator, which is an ML model trained by an imitation learning (IL) approach (Chen et al. 2022). Highquality expert solutions are obtained by a well-designed offline OR algorithm. Figure 12 depicts the divide-andconquer framework.
方法 1：“分而治之”框架结合模仿学习与 GNN 算法框架。为实时解决多对一指派问题，调度系统采用了增强的分而治之求解框架，在每次调度时将原始的大规模多对一指派问题分解为一系列一对一子问题，按顺序求解，从而形成渐进的在线求解过程。每个子问题都很简单，可以在多项式时间内解决，从而大大减轻计算负担。为保证解的质量，分解和迭代轮次由一个全局协调器精心引导和控制，该协调器是通过模仿学习（IL）方法训练的机器学习模型（Chen et al. 2022）。高质量的专家解由精心设计的离线运筹学算法获得。图 12 描绘了分而治之框架。
Divide-and-Conquer Strategy. The divide-and-conquer strategy splits orders into multiple iterative steps to construct the corresponding assignment results in sequence; that is, at each iteration, only a part of the orders are assigned to the couriers. The iteration process ends when a complete assignment result is generated. Within this framework, the many-to-one assignment
分而治之策略。分而治之策略将订单划分为多个迭代步骤，按顺序构建相应的配送指派结果；也就是说，在每次迭代中，仅将部分订单分配给骑手。迭代过程在生成完整的指派结果时结束。在此框架下，多对一指派
result is built by separating the orders into different iterations rather than a direct combination of orders. Only limited MD scores are calculated at each iteration, thus greatly reducing the computational burden of the previous stages. Moreover, the subproblem at each iteration degrades to a polynomial-time problem in which the scale is much smaller than the original one and that can be solved easily by traditional OR methods, such as the Kuhn-Munkras algorithm (Munkres 1957).
结果是通过将订单分到不同迭代中来构建的，而不是直接将订单组合在一起。每次迭代只计算有限的 MD 分数，从而大大减少了前几阶段的计算负担。此外，每次迭代的子问题退化为一个多项式时间问题，其规模远小于原问题，可以用传统的运筹学方法轻松解决，例如 Kuhn–Munkres 算法（Munkres 1957）。
Therefore, within this framework, choosing orders to assign at each round, that is, how to execute decomposition, is important to the solution quality. With welldesigned decomposition strategies, the methods can achieve better solution quality with limited MD score calculation volume, with polynomial or linear complexity, instead of combinatorial explosion. Meanwhile, the algorithm for solving each subproblem is of polynomial complexity.
因此，在该框架内，每轮选择分配哪些订单，即如何执行分解，对解的质量非常重要。通过精心设计的分解策略，这些方法能够在有限的 MD 评分计算量下，以多项式或线性复杂度（而非组合爆炸）获得更好的解质量。与此同时，用于求解每个子问题的算法也是多项式复杂度。
Execution Architecture. In practice, to improve the solution quality, the dispatch system adopts a ML coordinator to guide the decomposition online. The dispatch system is trained offline using the IL method and uses expert solutions from an enhanced tabu search method as its labels.
执行架构。实际上，为了提高解质量，派单系统采用一个机器学习协调器在线指导分解。派单系统在离线使用模仿学习（IL）方法训练，并使用由增强禁忌搜索方法产生的专家解作为其标签。
During the offline training phase, a traditional tabu search method is optimized to improve its solution quality. Based on the expert solutions generated by the enhanced tabu search method, we employ the IL method
在离线训练阶段，会对传统的禁忌搜索方法进行优化以提升其解质量。基于增强禁忌搜索方法生成的专家解，我们采用了模仿学习（IL）方法
Figure 11: Figure 12. (Color online) Imitation Learning (IL) Divide-and-Conquer Framework
图 11：图 12。（彩色在线）模仿学习（IL）分而治之框架
Notes. The original many-to-one assignment problem is decomposed into a series of one-to-one subassignment problems, which are solved sequentially. A global coordinator is trained offline using IL methods with high-quality solutions as its labels. In addition, the coordinator controls and guides the online solution procedure.
说明。原始的多对一指派问题被分解为一系列一对一子指派问题，按顺序求解。一个全局协调器使用高质量解作为标签，通过模仿学习方法在离线训练。此外，该协调器控制并引导在线求解过程。
(He et al. 2012) to train a global coordinator generating the optimal matching probability of the orders and their available couriers.
（He et al. 2012）用于训练一个全局协调器，生成订单与可用快递员之间的最优匹配概率。
During the online solution stage, the orders to assign at each iteration are chosen according to the online inference outputs of the coordinator; that is, orders with higher average optimal matching probabilities are selected to be assigned at the current iteration. Because the coordinator extracts global information from the expert solutions, the algorithm can effectively avoid local greed; moreover, it can search more widely and deeply in the search space, thus coming closer to the quality of expert solutions.
在在线求解阶段，每次迭代要分配的订单是根据协调器的在线推断输出选择的；也就是说，平均最优匹配概率较高的订单会被选为在当前迭代中分配。由于协调器从专家解中提取全局信息，该算法能够有效避免局部贪心；此外，它还能在搜索空间中进行更广更深的搜索，从而更接近专家解的质量。
The proposed algorithm, which we tested using nationwide data randomly sampled from actual operational data in 2021, improved assignment quality by 5 % − 10 % 5 % − 10 % 5%-10%5 \%-10 \%; in addition, as the order volume increased, the degree of improvement also increased.
我们用随机抽取的 2021 年实际运营全国数据测试了所提出的算法，作业分配质量提高了 5 % − 10 % 5 % − 10 % 5%-10%5 \%-10 \% ；此外，随着订单量的增加，改进幅度也随之增加。
Online Order Combination: Learning from Experienced Couriers via GNN. To reduce the number of iterations and additionally improve the computational efficiency without sacrificing solution quality, it was necessary to construct an efficient online order combination mechanism, forcing the subproblem at each iteration to generate many-to-one assignments. The mechanism needed to recognize the complicated relationships between different
在线订单组合：通过 GNN 向有经验的快递员学习。为了在不牺牲解质量的前提下降低迭代次数并进一步提高计算效率，有必要构建一个高效的在线订单组合机制，强制每次迭代的子问题生成多对一分配。该机制需要识别不同订单之间的复杂关系，并找到将它们作为互斥组进行组合的有效方法。
orders and find effective ways to combine them as mutually exclusive groups.
订单并找到有效的组合方式，使其成为互斥的群组。
An intuitive solution is to group orders with nearby origin-destination pairs and delivery time windows to share delivery resources. We call this method a static order combination when it only uses limited and static information from the order itself. After interviewing experienced couriers and observing the actual delivery of orders in practice, we found that many couriers could flexibly group various orders based on their personal perceptions and experiences learned over the course of their work, a subjective and dynamic approach that is more complicated than a static grouping approach.
一种直观的解决方案是将起讫点相近且送达时间窗接近的订单进行分组以共享配送资源。当仅使用订单本身的有限且静态信息时，我们称这种方法为静态订单组合。在采访了有经验的骑手并观察实际订单配送后，我们发现许多骑手会根据他们在工作中逐步形成的个人感知和经验灵活地组合各种订单——这是一种主观且动态的方法，比静态分组方法更为复杂。
Accordingly, we developed a GNN-based framework by learning directly from experienced couriers and using this knowledge to guide the online order combination; that is, by analyzing the historical patterns of experienced couriers, we can generate promising order combinations. With the learn-from-humans mechanism, this method could identify more delivery patterns and cluster orders by finding effective and flexible ways to solve the assignment problem. Figure 13 presents the framework of this proposed method. Detailed designs of the three steps described are as follows.
因此，我们开发了一个基于图神经网络的框架，直接向有经验的骑手学习并将这些知识用于指导在线订单组合；也就是说，通过分析有经验骑手的历史模式，我们可以生成有前景的订单组合。通过向人学习的机制，该方法能够识别更多的配送模式，并通过寻找有效且灵活的方式来解决指派问题从而对订单进行聚类。图 13 展示了该方法的框架。下面是对所述三步的详细设计。
Delivery Network Construction. We first group orders with the same origin area of interest (AOI) and destination
配送网络构建。我们首先将来自相同出发兴趣区域（AOI）并且目的地相同的订单分组
Figure 12: Figure 13. (Color online) Framework for Modeling the Delivery Network via GNN
图 12：图 13。（彩色在线）通过 GNN 建模配送网络的框架
Note. The framework contains three steps: (1) construct efficient graph: constructing an efficient delivery graph with flow (i.e., aggregation of orders with the same origin and destination) as a basic unit by merging massive delivery records from experienced couriers; (2) graph representation learning: applying GNN to model the graph and extracting combination patterns from it as representative vectors of each flow; and (3) clustering-based order structure: using representative vectors to cluster orders into various groups to decompose assignment tasks and working with the above “divide-and-conquer” algorithm to achieve better matching results.
注：该框架包含三步：（1）构建高效图：通过合并大量有经验配送员的配送记录，以流（即具有相同出发地和目的地的订单聚合）为基本单元构建高效的配送图；（2）图表示学习：应用 GNN 对图进行建模，并从中提取组合作式作为每个流的表示向量；（3）基于聚类的订单结构：使用表示向量将订单聚类成各类群组，以分解指派任务，并与上述“分而治之”算法协同以取得更好的匹配结果。
AOI as a flow session. Based on the couriers’ experiences, we preprocess the delivery order sequence from selected couriers as independent delivery sessions and convert each session to a flow session. When regarding flow as a node and nearby relations in sequence as a link, we can merge these flow sessions into a union graph as a delivery network. Furthermore, each flow node also exhibits useful attributes to describe its crucial characteristics, for example, the delivery distance between origin and destination and the average delivery time in the past 30 days.
将 AOI 视为一个流会话。基于骑手的经验，我们将所选骑手的配送订单序列预处理为独立的配送会话，并将每个会话转换为一个流会话。当把流视为节点、序列中的相邻关系视为连边时，我们可以将这些流会话合并为一个作为配送网络的并图。此外，每个流节点还具有描述其关键特征的有用属性，例如起点与终点之间的配送距离以及过去 30 天的平均配送时间。
Graph Representation Learning. With the flow-based delivery network as input, we apply graph representation learning methods (Hamilton 2020) to extract specific patterns from it. Our goal is to learn the vector representation of a node, which contains its attributes and topology information in the graph after training. We apply classical graph learning models (Hamilton et al. 2017, Wang et al. 2018) to learn the basic vector representation of flow node and apply some well-known methods (Bengio et al. 2009) to optimize the quality of vector representation.
图表示学习。以基于流的配送网络为输入，我们应用图表示学习方法（Hamilton 2020）从中提取特定模式。我们的目标是在训练后学习节点的向量表示，该表示包含其属性和图中的拓扑信息。我们应用经典的图学习模型（Hamilton et al. 2017, Wang et al. 2018）来学习流节点的基础向量表示，并采用一些知名方法（Bengio et al. 2009）来优化向量表示的质量。
Online Order Combination. After obtaining the vector representation of the flow node, we define a similaritybased metric to combine the orders together. Basically, we use the dot-product results of vector representations of two flow nodes as the similarity metric of the combination. Similar flow nodes with large dot-product results can be regarded as a candidate group to participate in the assignment problem. As we show on the right side of Figure 13, we use this similarity metric to cluster the
在线订单合并。在获得流节点的向量表示后，我们定义了一个基于相似性的度量来将订单合并在一起。基本上，我们使用两个流节点的向量表示的点积结果作为合并的相似性度量。具有较大点积结果的相似流节点可以被视为参与派单问题的候选组。如我们在图 13 右侧所示，我们使用该相似性度量对这些节点进行聚类，
historical orders into communities and validate the clustering results (e.g., whether geographical similarity is encoded) by humans in various cases.
将历史订单划分为社区，并在各种情况下由人工验证聚类结果（例如，是否编码了地理相似性）。
Method 2: Multistage Subproblem Reformulation with Machine Learning. We also propose a multistage solution algorithm based on neighborhood search and ML to solve the many-to-one assignment problem at each dispatch moment. The algorithm constructs subproblems by adding constraints to the original one, which limits the variations in the solution space of the currentstage subproblem compared with the previous stage. Specifically, one source of the complexity of the original many-to-one assignment problem is that orders can be arbitrarily grouped together as a batch and assigned to the same courier (the number of batched groups increases exponentially with the number of orders in the groups). To reduce complexity, the main constraints added to the subproblem are the selections of the newly batched groups that can be added in the current stage. In addition, we also include constraints on the number of assignable couriers for the orders/groups and the number of assignable orders for the courier. These added constraints greatly reduce the scale and complexity of the problem, resulting in a significant reduction in the construction and solution complexity. By solving the multistage subproblems sequentially, we can obtain an approximate solution to the original problem.
方法二：基于机器学习的多阶段子问题重构。我们还提出了一种基于邻域搜索和机器学习的多阶段求解算法，用以在每个派单时刻解决多对一指派问题。该算法通过向原问题中加入约束来构建子问题，从而限制当前阶段子问题的解空间相较于前一阶段的变化。具体而言，原始多对一指派问题的复杂性来源之一在于订单可以任意地被组合成批并分配给同一位骑手（被分批组合的数量随组内订单数呈指数增长）。为降低复杂性，加入到子问题中的主要约束是当前阶段可新增的已成批组合的选择。此外，我们还对订单/分组可被分配的骑手数量以及骑手可被分配的订单数量设定了约束。这些附加约束大大减少了问题的规模和复杂性，从而显著降低了构建和求解的复杂性。 通过顺序求解多阶段子问题，我们可以获得原问题的近似解。
A key aspect of the proposed multistage solution algorithm is how to select appropriate new constraints. We utilize a combination of rule-based and ML-based constraint generation methods to achieve better results.
所提出的多阶段求解算法的一个关键方面是如何选择合适的新约束。我们结合基于规则和基于机器学习的约束生成方法以获得更好的结果。
Figure 13: Figure 14. Use of the Proposed Multistage Solution Algorithm, Which Considers Four Orders and Four Couriers
图 13：图 14。所提出的多阶段求解算法的使用，考虑了四个订单和四名配送员
Notes. At each stage, the constraints generation method is utilized to add constraints to the original problem, formulating a subproblem with smaller complexity (i.e., fewer edges allowed). The constraints generation method uses the original problem and the solution of the previous stage as inputs, forming a solution space that is close to the previous solution and, if possible, contains the optimal solution. The proposed variable neighborhood search algorithm is then implemented to solve the subproblem. The overall process stops when no additional new subproblems can be formulated or when solutions of consecutive stages remain the same. In this example, the method stops after three stages.
注：在每个阶段，约束生成方法用于向原问题添加约束，构成一个复杂度更小的子问题（即允许的边更少）。约束生成方法以原问题和前一阶段的解作为输入，形成一个接近前一解且在可能情况下包含最优解的解空间。然后实现所提出的变邻域搜索算法来求解该子问题。当无法再构造出额外的新子问题或连续阶段的解保持不变时，整个过程停止。在此示例中，该方法在三阶段后停止。
For the rule-based method, we use expert knowledge to generate various constraints. For example, we can implement a rule such that only the orders that have near pickup points can be grouped as a batch and assigned to the same courier, or a rule that each order can be assigned only to the courier when the order’s pickup point is close to the courier’s current location. Different rules will affect the construction of subproblems, which in turn will affect the solution quality and efficiency of the original problem. We apply these rules to our practical examples and choose the best rules that balance quality and efficiency. For the ML-based method, we use the branch-and-bound method to solve the many-to-one assignment problems offline and use the resulting batched groups to train an XGBoost-based classification model (Chen et al. 2015) to predict whether the batched groups will be present in the final solutions. In the online stage, the model predictions are used to generate constraints to guide the selections of batched groups. By combining these methods, the construction of each subproblem (i.e., the computational time of f t , w ¯ 0 , r f t , w ¯ 0 , r f_(t, bar(w))^(0,r)f_{t, \bar{w}}^{0, r} ) can be completed within seconds.
对于基于规则的方法，我们使用专家知识来生成各种约束。例如，我们可以实现这样一个规则：只有那些取货点接近的订单才能被分组为一批并分配给同一位骑手，或者只有当订单的取货点接近骑手当前位置时，该订单才能被分配给该骑手。不同的规则会影响子问题的构建，进而影响原始问题的解的质量和效率。我们将这些规则应用于实际示例，并选择在质量和效率之间取得最佳平衡的规则。对于基于机器学习的方法，我们在线下使用分支定界法求解多对一指派问题，并使用得到的批量分组来训练基于 XGBoost 的分类模型（Chen et al. 2015），以预测这些批量分组是否会出现在最终解中。在在线阶段，模型预测用于生成约束以指导批量分组的选择。通过结合这些方法，每个子问题的构建（即 f t , w ¯ 0 , r f t , w ¯ 0 , r f_(t, bar(w))^(0,r)f_{t, \bar{w}}^{0, r} 的计算时间）都可以在几秒钟内完成。
Although we limit the complexity of the subproblems by adding constraints, they still cannot be solved in real time using exact methods such as branch-and-bound. To address this, we propose a variable neighborhood search algorithm (Hansen and Mladenović 2001) in which we
尽管我们通过添加约束来限制子问题的复杂性，但它们仍然无法用分支定界等精确方法实时求解。为此，我们提出了一种变邻域搜索算法（Hansen 和 Mladenović 2001），在其中我们
design neighborhood operators to exploit the problem structure and numerical features. During the neighborhood search process, we efficiently select the optimal neighborhood operator by estimating the impact of the operator on the objective function. This enables an efficient search mechanism and high-quality solutions.
设计邻域算子以利用问题结构和数值特征。在邻域搜索过程中，我们通过估计算子对目标函数的影响来有效选择最佳邻域算子。这实现了高效的搜索机制和高质量的解。
Figure 14 shows an example of the proposed method. Note that the proposed multistage solution algorithm provides some benefits of general large-neighborhood search algorithms (Pisinger and Ropke 2019). However, by carefully designing the added constraints based on the problem characteristics, we have been able to significantly reduce the complexity while facilitating the solution trajectory rapidly approaching the optimal solution. Typically, to solve the citywide order assignment problems, only three to five stages are needed to converge to a satisfactory near-optimal solution and the total construction and solution time is within 10 seconds.
图 14 展示了所提出方法的一个示例。需要注意的是，所提出的多阶段求解算法具备一般大邻域搜索算法（Pisinger 和 Ropke 2019）的一些优势。然而，通过根据问题特征精心设计加入的约束，我们能够显著降低复杂性，同时使解轨迹快速接近最优解。通常，为了解决全城范围的订单分配问题，仅需三到五个阶段即可收敛到令人满意的近似最优解，且总的构建与求解时间在 10 秒以内。

Reassignment: Technical Solutions for Abnormal Scenario
重新分配：异常场景的技术解决方案

In most cases, the courier who accepts the assignment is expected to deliver the assigned order. However, because we assign orders over 30 minutes on average before a courier’s arrival, we cannot predict all the potential problems that couriers may encounter during the actual delivery process. If unforeseen problems arise,
在大多数情况下，接单的骑手会被期望去配送所分配的订单。然而，由于我们通常在骑手到达前平均提前 30 分钟分配订单，因而无法预测骑手在实际配送过程中可能遇到的所有潜在问题。如果出现意外情况，
completing the original assignments may negatively affect the delivery experience and efficiency of the courier. For example, when delivering multiple orders, if the preparation of one order is delayed, the courier must wait for the order at the merchant’s location, which will delay the arrival time of all the orders that the courier is delivering. We use the reassignment scheme to address this problem: based on the latest environmental and estimated information, we reassign orders that have not yet been picked up to other appropriate couriers if doing so will improve the quality of assignment and delivery efficiency in dynamic and uncertain environments.
完成原有派单可能会对骑手的配送体验和效率产生负面影响。例如，当配送多单时，如果其中一单的备餐延迟，骑手必须在商家处等待该订单，这会延迟骑手所配送的所有订单的到达时间。我们使用重新分配方案来解决该问题：基于最新的环境和估计信息，对于尚未被取走的订单，如果将其重新分配给其他合适的骑手能够提升派单质量和在动态不确定环境中的配送效率，则进行重新分配。
Our system implements two types of reassignment. One is initiated by the system, and the second is initiated by the courier. Both types implement similar processes:
我们的系统实现了两类重新分配。一类由系统发起，另一类由骑手发起。两种类型都执行相似的流程：
Step 1: Collecting orders for reassignment. For those initiated by the system, the orders that merit reassigning are identified by an online algorithm that monitors the delivery process of couriers. Specifically, we run RP algorithms each minute to estimate the delivery sequences and distances of the couriers in the cases in which the couriers retain all their assigned orders, as well as the cases in which one or more orders have been removed from a courier’s assigned deliveries and reassigned to another courier. By comparing the estimated delivery processes of the courier before and after the removal, we choose the order that is most beneficial for delivery efficiency because the order needed to be reassigned. Additionally, couriers can also request reassignment through our application if they encounter abnormal problems that will negatively affect their delivery schedules.
第 1 步：收集需重新分配的订单。对于由系统发起的情况，值得重新分配的订单由一个在线算法识别，该算法监控配送员的配送过程。具体来说，我们每分钟运行 RP 算法来估计配送员在两种情况下的配送顺序和距离：一种是配送员保留其所有被分配订单的情况，另一种是从配送员的被分配配送中移除一个或多个订单并将其重新分配给其他配送员的情况。通过比较移除前后对配送员的估计配送过程，我们选择因重新分配而最有利于提升配送效率的订单。此外，配送员在遇到会对其配送进度产生负面影响的异常问题时，也可以通过我们的应用请求重新分配。
Step 2: Finding appropriate couriers for the orders. Unlike our standard dispatch problem, the reassignment problem is a one-to-one assignment problem. We use the Hungarian algorithm (Kuhn 1955) and the same objectives as in a standard dispatch.
第 2 步：为这些订单寻找合适的配送员。与我们的标准调度问题不同，重新分配问题是一个一对一的指派问题。我们使用匈牙利算法（Kuhn 1955）以及与标准调度相同的目标函数。
Step 3 (note: we skip this step for reassignments initiated by the courier): Contact the courier currently assigned to the order through a pop-up prompt on our application to inquire if that courier agrees to the reassignment. If the courier declines, we halt the reassignment process.
第 3 步（注：对于由骑手发起的改派，我们略过此步骤）：通过我们应用上的弹出提示联系当前被指派的骑手，询问该骑手是否同意改派。如果骑手拒绝，我们终止改派流程。
Step 4: Using our application, contact the courier who is considered to be more appropriate for the reassigned order to inquire if that courier is willing to take on the reassignment. If the courier accepts the reassignment, we complete the process; if the courier declines the reassignment, we stop the process. We note that if an order triggers a reassignment but is ultimately declined by either courier, this order will not trigger a reassignment again in the future.
第 4 步：使用我们的应用联系被认为更适合接手改派订单的骑手，询问该骑手是否愿意接受改派。如果骑手接受改派，我们完成该流程；如果骑手拒绝改派，我们停止该流程。我们注意到，如果某个订单触发了改派但最终被任一骑手拒绝，该订单将来不会再次触发改派。
With an overall decline rate of 30 % 30 % 30%30 \%, about 1 % 1 % 1%1 \% of all orders are completed by new couriers found through the reassignment process, according to nationwide statistics for June 2022. Prior to its nationwide implementation, a two-week A/B experiment, covering approximately 5 % 5 % 5%5 \%
根据 2022 年 6 月的全国统计，整体拒绝率为 30 % 30 % 30%30 \% ，约有 1 % 1 % 1%1 \% 的所有订单是通过改派流程由新骑手完成的。在全国推广之前，进行了一项为期两周的 A/B 实验，覆盖了大约 5 % 5 % 5%5 \%
of the national order volume, was conducted in 10 cities and showed that the delivery intervals for these reassigned orders were on average shortened by over one minute.
在全国订单量的占比为 的范围内，该研究在 10 个城市进行，结果显示这些被重新分配订单的配送时长平均缩短了一分钟以上。

Benefits  收益

The dispatch system has provided significant benefits, including business development and financial benefits for Meituan, optimized experiences for couriers, consumers, and merchants, reduced environmental impacts, and enhanced response to the COVID-19 pandemic.
该调度系统带来了显著收益，包括美团的业务发展和财务利益，为骑手、消费者和商家优化了体验，减少了环境影响，并增强了对新冠疫情的应对能力。

Business Development  业务发展

Since its listing on the Hong Kong stock exchange in 2018, Meituan, as one of the world’s largest online and on-demand delivery platforms, has achieved significant growth. From 2019 to 2022, the number of cities Meituan covers increased by 40 % 40 % 40%40 \% and the number of registered users increased by 60.76 % 60.76 % 60.76%60.76 \% (Table 1). In addition, the number of merchants on the platform increased by 55.93 % 55.93 % 55.93%55.93 \%, and the number of couriers serving the platform to deliver food increased by 32.08 % 32.08 % 32.08%32.08 \%. The daily average number of transactions in peak seasons (e.g., summer peak from July to August) increased by 100% to about 60 million.
自 2018 年在香港证券交易所上市以来，作为全球最大的在线和即时配送平台之一，美团实现了显著增长。2019 年至 2022 年间，美团覆盖的城市数量增加了 40 % 40 % 40%40 \% ，注册用户数量增加了 60.76 % 60.76 % 60.76%60.76 \% （表 1）。此外，平台上的商家数量增加了 55.93 % 55.93 % 55.93%55.93 \% ，为平台配送餐食的骑手数量增加了 32.08 % 32.08 % 32.08%32.08 \% 。高峰季节（如 7 月至 8 月的夏季高峰）日均交易量增长了 100%，约为 6000 万笔。
As the number of transactions increases, the dispatch problem becomes more challenging, especially in peak hours (e.g., lunch hours from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m.) when about 20 million orders could be assigned to about five million couriers.
随着交易量增加，派单问题变得更加棘手，尤其是在高峰时段（例如上午 11 点到下午 1 点的午餐时段），约有 2000 万单可能需要分配给约 500 万名骑手。
The dispatch system that we developed increased the efficiency of couriers and significantly improved the satisfaction of couriers, consumers, and merchants.
我们开发的调度系统提高了骑手的效率，并显著提升了骑手、消费者和商家的满意度。

Courier and Consumer Experience
骑手和消费者体验

For consumers, the time from placing an order to receiving the delivery decreased by 20.96 % 20.96 % 20.96%20.96 \% with the implementation of the dispatch system. For couriers, the average number of daily delivered orders per full-time courier increased by more than 109 % 109 % 109%109 \%. In addition, the average courier’s travel distance per order decreased by about 0.5 km for each order (from 2 to 1.5 km ). For merchants, the average pickup time per order decreased by 16.0 % 16.0 % 16.0%16.0 \%.
对于消费者，自配送系统实施以来，从下单到收到配送的时间减少了 20.96 % 20.96 % 20.96%20.96 \% 。对于骑手，每位全职骑手的日均派单数量增加了超过 109 % 109 % 109%109 \% 。此外，每单骑手的平均行驶距离约减少了 0.5 公里（从 2 公里降至 1.5 公里）。对于商家，每单的平均取餐时间减少了 16.0 % 16.0 % 16.0%16.0 \% 。

表 1：表 1. 我们对美团从配送系统中获得收益的估算（2022 年 vs. 2019 年）

Financial Benefits  财政收益

From 2019 to 2022, the system contributed to a daily decrease of $ 0.64 $ 0.64 $0.64\$ 0.64 million in costs (associated with payments to couriers) to Meituan, which amounts to a cost reduction of about $ 0.23 $ 0.23 $0.23\$ 0.23 billion annually.
从 2019 年到 2022 年，该系统每天为美团降低了 $ 0.64 $ 0.64 $0.64\$ 0.64 百万元的成本（与支付给骑手相关），相当于每年约减少 $ 0.23 $ 0.23 $0.23\$ 0.23 亿元的成本。

Environmental Impact  环境影响

在调度系统实施后，我们每天减少了约 532 , 125 kg 532 , 125 kg 532,125kg532,125 \mathrm{~kg} 的二氧化碳（ CO 2 CO 2 CO_(2)\mathrm{CO}_{2} ）排放。我们按如下方式计算该值：

Response to COVID-19  应对 COVID-19

The dispatch system helped Meituan respond quickly to the many complexities associated with the COVID-19 pandemic. Under the severe epidemic situation in many cities in China, the demand for food delivery surged; however, the supply of couriers decreased significantly. Thus, the supply and demand ratio became extremely tight, and a considerable number of orders were canceled. By adapting the system flexibly, including denying “irresponsible refusals” for couriers, relaxing the consideration of punctuality (i.e., tolerating late deliveries), and changing Meituan’s objective to completing the orders rather than delivering them on time, we provided better experiences for consumers, couriers, and merchants, especially in cities that were severely impacted by the pandemic.
这一调度系统帮助美团快速应对与 COVID-19 大流行相关的诸多复杂情况。在中国许多城市疫情严峻的情况下，外卖需求激增；然而，配送员供应显著减少。因此，供需比变得极度紧张，导致相当多的订单被取消。通过灵活调整系统，包括拒绝配送员的“无责任拒单”、放宽对准时性的考虑（即容忍延迟配送）以及将美团的目标从准时送达改为完成订单，我们为消费者、配送员和商家提供了更好的体验，尤其是在受疫情严重影响的城市。

Extending the Use of the Dispatch System
扩展调度系统的使用

Meituan’s vision is to help its customers eat better and live better. In this sense, the role of the dispatch system is critical. It enables the thriving of other new business formats in the digital economy within Meituan, such as Meituan shopping, Meituan groceries, and Meituan drugs.
美团的愿景是帮助用户吃得更好、生活得更好。在这方面，调度系统的作用至关重要。它促进了美团内部数字经济中其他新业态的繁荣发展，例如美团买菜、美团超市和美团买药。
With the rapid development of the digital economy in recent years, real-time assignment problems are becoming more common and fundamental in many industrial fields. The analytics and OR techniques used in a dispatch system are not only limited to a food delivery setting but are highly portable to other settings both within and outside of Meituan; examples include dispatching computational resources and displaying online advertisements.
随着近年来数字经济的快速发展，实时指派问题在许多工业领域变得越来越普遍且具有基础性。调度系统中使用的分析和运筹学技术不仅限于外卖场景，而且高度可移植到美团内外的其他场景；例如调度计算资源和展示网络广告。

Conclusions  结论

After years of development and research, Meituan’s realtime intelligent dispatch system, built on a set of algorithms derived from operations research and machine learning techniques, can accurately model and solve the order assignment problem within seconds, generating high-quality solutions. Since its implementation in 2019, Meituan has achieved a remarkable reduction of 20.96% in average order delivery time and 23.77 % 23.77 % 23.77%23.77 \% in average courier travel distance per order. Moreover, the system has contributed to yearly cost reductions of approximately $ 0.23 $ 0.23 $0.23\$ 0.23 billion. It has successfully enabled Meituan to achieve a win-win situation by striking a balance among the goals and interests of all stakeholders involved.
经过多年的开发与研究，美团的实时智能调度系统基于一套来源于运筹学与机器学习技术的算法，能够在数秒内准确建模并求解订单分配问题，生成高质量的解。自 2019 年实施以来，美团平均订单配送时长显著减少了 20.96%，每单配送员平均行驶里程减少了 23.77 % 23.77 % 23.77%23.77 \% 。此外，该系统每年为公司节约成本约 $ 0.23 $ 0.23 $0.23\$ 0.23 亿元。它成功地帮助美团在所有相关方的目标与利益之间实现了双赢的平衡。

Appendix A. Calculation of an E-Bike Carbon Footprint
附录 A. 电动自行车碳足迹的计算

The carbon footprint of an e-bike can be calculated as follows.
电动自行车的碳足迹可按如下方法计算。
In the following calculations, g / km g / km g//km\mathrm{g} / \mathrm{km} represents grams per kilometer and km / h km / h km//h\mathrm{km} / \mathrm{h} represents kilometers per hour.
在下列计算中， g / km g / km g//km\mathrm{g} / \mathrm{km} 表示克/公里， km / h km / h km//h\mathrm{km} / \mathrm{h} 表示公里/小时。
The carbon footprint of an e-bike can be measured by manufacturing consumption + electricity consumption + caloric output.
一辆电动自行车的碳足迹可由制造消耗 + 用电消耗 + 热量消耗来衡量。
(1) Manufacturing consumption: 7 g CO 2 7 g CO 2 7gCO_(2)7 \mathrm{~g} \mathrm{CO}_{2} per km
（1）制造消耗： 7 g CO 2 7 g CO 2 7gCO_(2)7 \mathrm{~g} \mathrm{CO}_{2} 每公里
The European Cyclists’ Federation (ECF) (European Cyclists’ Federation 2011) estimates that an e-bike has an average manufacturing carbon footprint of 134 kg of CO 2 CO 2 CO_(2)\mathrm{CO}_{2}. With a lifespan of 19 , 200 km 19 , 200 km 19,200km19,200 \mathrm{~km}, the manufacturing consumption of an e-bike can be calculated as 7 g / km = 134 kg / 19 , 200 km 7 g / km = 134 kg / 19 , 200 km 7g//km=134kg//19,200km7 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km}=134 \mathrm{~kg} / 19,200 \mathrm{~km}.
欧洲骑行者联盟（ECF）（European Cyclists’ Federation 2011）估计，一辆电动自行车的平均制造碳足迹为 134 公斤 CO 2 CO 2 CO_(2)\mathrm{CO}_{2} 。在寿命为 19 , 200 km 19 , 200 km 19,200km19,200 \mathrm{~km} 的情况下，电动自行车的制造消耗可计算为 7 g / km = 134 kg / 19 , 200 km 7 g / km = 134 kg / 19 , 200 km 7g//km=134kg//19,200km7 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km}=134 \mathrm{~kg} / 19,200 \mathrm{~km} 。
(2) Electricity consumption: 3.2 g CO 2 3.2 g CO 2 3.2gCO_(2)3.2 \mathrm{~g} \mathrm{CO}_{2} per km
（2）用电消耗： 3.2 g CO 2 3.2 g CO 2 3.2gCO_(2)3.2 \mathrm{~g} \mathrm{CO}_{2} 每公里
According to Bosch’s e-bike range calculator (Bosch 2022), a city e-bike with a 500 watt hour (Wh) battery will provide a range of 94 km under typical commuting conditions (assuming an average speed of 22 km / h 22 km / h 22km//h22 \mathrm{~km} / \mathrm{h}, mountain bike tires, sports assistance mode (i.e., a driving mode similar to the driving behavior of food delivery drivers), and 85 kg combined weight (i.e., the weight of the driver and the weight of the delivery)). Assuming a charging efficiency of 90 % 90 % 90%90 \% (some energy from the plug is not imparted into the battery), an e-bike will require 500 Wh / 94 km / 90 % 500 Wh / 94 km / 90 % 500Wh//94km//90%500 \mathrm{~Wh} / 94 \mathrm{~km} / 90 \% (i.e., 5.9 Wh ) of electricity from the grid to travel each kilometer. In addition, the carbon intensity of electricity in China in 2021 was 0.549 g of CO 2 CO 2 CO_(2)\mathrm{CO}_{2} per Wh of electricity (Statista 2022). Thus, we calculate electricity use as 5.9 Wh × 0.549 g / Wh = 3.2 g CO 2 5.9 Wh × 0.549 g / Wh = 3.2 g CO 2 5.9Whxx0.549g//Wh=3.2gCO_(2)5.9 \mathrm{~Wh} \times 0.549 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{Wh}=3.2 \mathrm{~g} \mathrm{CO}_{2} per km.
根据博世的电动自行车续航计算器（Bosch 2022），一辆配备 500 瓦时（Wh）电池的城市电动自行车在典型通勤条件下的续航里程为 94 公里（假设平均速度为 22 km / h 22 km / h 22km//h22 \mathrm{~km} / \mathrm{h} ，山地自行车轮胎，运动助力模式（即类似外卖骑手的行驶模式），以及 85 公斤的总重量（即骑手重量和外送物品重量））。假设充电效率为 90 % 90 % 90%90 \% （插座供给的一部分能量未能传入电池），电动自行车每行驶一公里将需要 500 Wh / 94 km / 90 % 500 Wh / 94 km / 90 % 500Wh//94km//90%500 \mathrm{~Wh} / 94 \mathrm{~km} / 90 \% （即 5.9 Wh）的电网电力。此外，2021 年中国电力的碳强度为每 Wh 电力产生 0.549 克 CO 2 CO 2 CO_(2)\mathrm{CO}_{2} （Statista 2022）。因此，我们计算出每公里的电力使用为 5.9 Wh × 0.549 g / Wh = 3.2 g CO 2 5.9 Wh × 0.549 g / Wh = 3.2 g CO 2 5.9Whxx0.549g//Wh=3.2gCO_(2)5.9 \mathrm{~Wh} \times 0.549 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{Wh}=3.2 \mathrm{~g} \mathrm{CO}_{2} 。
(3) Caloric output: 6.3 g CO 2 6.3 g CO 2 6.3gCO_(2)6.3 \mathrm{~g} \mathrm{CO}_{2} per km
（3）热量消耗：每公里 6.3 g CO 2 6.3 g CO 2 6.3gCO_(2)6.3 \mathrm{~g} \mathrm{CO}_{2}
The ECF (European Cyclists’ Federation 2011) assumes an average 70 − kg 70 − kg 70-kg70-\mathrm{kg} cyclist on an e-bike will burn only 4.4 calories per kilometer in addition to the calories the cyclist will burn when not riding an e-bike. Thus, with the ECF’s estimate for caloric output emissions ( 1.44 g CO 2 1.44 g CO 2 1.44gCO_(2)1.44 \mathrm{~g} \mathrm{CO}_{2} per calorie), we calculate 6.3 g CO 2 6.3 g CO 2 6.3gCO_(2)6.3 \mathrm{~g} \mathrm{CO}_{2} per km ( 4.4 calories / km × 1.44 CO 2 / / km × 1.44 CO 2 / //kmxx1.44CO_(2)/// \mathrm{km} \times 1.44 \mathrm{CO}_{2} / calories ) = 6.3 g CO 2 = 6.3 g CO 2 =6.3gCO_(2)=6.3 \mathrm{~g} \mathrm{CO}_{2} per km for caloric output.
欧洲骑行者联盟（ECF，2011）假定一名平均 70 − kg 70 − kg 70-kg70-\mathrm{kg} 的电动自行车骑手每公里仅额外消耗 4.4 卡路里的热量（相较于不骑电动自行车时的消耗）。因此，按照 ECF 对热量消耗排放的估算（每卡路里 1.44 g CO 2 1.44 g CO 2 1.44gCO_(2)1.44 \mathrm{~g} \mathrm{CO}_{2} ），我们计算出每公里为 6.3 g CO 2 6.3 g CO 2 6.3gCO_(2)6.3 \mathrm{~g} \mathrm{CO}_{2} （4.4 卡路里× / km × 1.44 CO 2 / / km × 1.44 CO 2 / //kmxx1.44CO_(2)/// \mathrm{km} \times 1.44 \mathrm{CO}_{2} / 卡路里） = 6.3 g CO 2 = 6.3 g CO 2 =6.3gCO_(2)=6.3 \mathrm{~g} \mathrm{CO}_{2} 每公里的热量消耗。
Therefore, 7 g / km + 3.2 g / km + 6.3 g / km = 16.5 g / km 7 g / km + 3.2 g / km + 6.3 g / km = 16.5 g / km 7g//km+3.2g//km+6.3g//km=16.5g//km7 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km}+3.2 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km}+6.3 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km}=16.5 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km} (carbon footprint).
因此， 7 g / km + 3.2 g / km + 6.3 g / km = 16.5 g / km 7 g / km + 3.2 g / km + 6.3 g / km = 16.5 g / km 7g//km+3.2g//km+6.3g//km=16.5g//km7 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km}+3.2 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km}+6.3 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km}=16.5 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km} （碳足迹）。

Here we present the notation that we use in this paper.
在此我们介绍本文中使用的符号约定。
The multiperiod, multiobjective dispatch problem can be formulated as
多期、多目标调度问题可以表述为
optimize x t ∈ X t { ∑ t ∈ T F o ( W t , R t , x t ) } o ∈ O s.t. x t non-anticipative, t ∈ T  optimize  x t ∈ X t ∑ t ∈ T   F o W t , R t , x t o ∈ O  s.t.  x t  non-anticipative,  t ∈ T {:[" optimize "_(x_(t)inX_(t)){sum_(t in T)F^(o)(W_(t),R_(t),x_(t))}_(o in O)],[" s.t. "x_(t)" non-anticipative, "t in T]:}\begin{aligned} \text { optimize }_{x_{t} \in X_{t}} & \left\{\sum_{t \in T} F^{o}\left(W_{t}, R_{t}, x_{t}\right)\right\}_{o \in O} \\ \text { s.t. } & x_{t} \text { non-anticipative, } t \in T \end{aligned}
where x t x t x_(t)x_{t} is nonanticipative, which means that decisions made at time t t tt are based on the information we have at time t t tt. This assignment problem can be decomposed into a series of single-period, single-objective deterministic assignment problems that are solved independently each time as we show here:
其中 x t x t x_(t)x_{t} 是非前瞻性的，这意味着在时间 t t tt 做出的决策基于我们在时间 t t tt 拥有的信息。这个指派问题可以分解为一系列单期、单目标的确定性指派问题，我们在此展示这些问题每次独立求解的过程：

段宁端是美团配送平台的算法专家。她的研究兴趣包括随机优化及其在即时配送中的应用。她在清华大学电子工程系获得博士学位。
Donghui Li received his PhD degree and BE degree in the Department of Industrial Engineering, Tsinghua University. He is currently an algorithm expert with Meituan. His research focuses on the application of data-driven optimization methods to realworld problems, especially under dynamic and stochastic scenarios.
李东辉在清华大学工业工程系获得博士学位和学士学位。目前他是美团的算法专家。他的研究侧重于将数据驱动的优化方法应用于现实问题，特别是在动态和随机场景下的应用。
Hongsen Liao is a senior engineer at Meituan. He leads the research of vehicle routing problem and delivery time prediction. His research interests include human behavior modeling, human-computer interaction, and visualization. He received a BS degree and PhD degree in computer software from Tsinghua University, in 2012 and 2017, respectively.
廖洪森是美团的高级工程师。他负责车辆路径问题和配送时间预测的研究。他的研究兴趣包括人类行为建模、人机交互和可视化。2012 年和 2017 年，他分别在清华大学获得计算机软件学士学位和博士学位。
Jie Feng is an algorithm expert at Meituan. He works on mining and applying human knowledge in the dispatching system to make it more intelligent. He obtained his PhD degree in electronic engineering from Tsinghua University, Beijing, China, in 2021. His papers, which cover the research topics on human mobility modeling and time series modeling, have total citations of more than 1,200.
冯杰是美团的算法专家。他致力于在调度系统中挖掘和应用人类知识，使其更智能化。他于 2021 年在中国北京清华大学获得电子工程博士学位。他的多篇论文涵盖人类出行建模和时间序列建模等研究课题，总引用次数超过 1200 次。
Jiuxia Zhao is an algorithm engineer at Meituan. Her main research direction includes deep reinforcement learning and decision intelligence, especially for order dispatching problems and vehicle routing problems. She received her MS degree from the School of Automation Science and Technology from Xi’an Jiaotong University, Xi’an, China, in 2021.
赵九霞是美团的算法工程师。她的主要研究方向包括深度强化学习和决策智能，特别针对订单派单问题和车辆路径问题。她于 2021 年在中国西安西安交通大学自动化科学与技术学院获得硕士学位。
Hao Ren is an algorithm expert at Meituan. His current research direction is the application of machine learning in rider behavior and decision making. He received his BS degree and MS degree in industrial engineering from Tianjin University.
任昊是美团的算法专家。他当前的研究方向是机器学习在骑手行为与决策中的应用。他在天津大学获得工业工程学士和硕士学位。
Xuetao Ding is a principal research engineer of Meituan. His main research direction is machine learning and decision intelligence, including recommendation, order dispatching algorithm, causal learning for pricing, and supply demand optimization.
丁学陶是美团的首席研究工程师，主要研究方向是机器学习与决策智能，包括推荐、订单派单算法、定价的因果学习以及供需优化。
Ying Cha is a senior engineer at Meituan. She leads the research of global flexible intelligent delivery order scheduling and vehicle routing planning. Her research interests include operational research optimization and machine learning. She received her MS degree in systems engineering from Northeastern University.
查颖是美团的高级工程师，负责全球弹性智能配送订单调度与车辆路径规划的研究。她的研究兴趣包括运筹学优化与机器学习。她获得了美国东北大学的系统工程硕士学位。

Jie Zheng received her PhD degree in control theory and control engineering from Tsinghua University in 2023. She worked as a research intern at Meituan from 2019 to 2022. Her main research interests include the scheduling problem under uncertainty with intelligent optimization.
郑杰（Jie Zheng）于 2023 年在清华大学获得控制理论与控制工程博士学位。她在 2019 年至 2022 年期间曾在美团担任研究实习生。她的主要研究兴趣包括基于智能优化的不确定性调度问题。
Ling Wang received his PhD degree in control theory and control engineering from Tsinghua University in 1999. He has been with the Department of Automation, Tsinghua University, since 1999, where he became a full professor in 2008. He has authored five academic books and more than 300 refereed papers. His current research interests include computational intelligence-based optimization and scheduling.
王岭（Ling Wang）于 1999 年在清华大学获得控制理论与控制工程博士学位。自 1999 年起他一直在清华大学自动化系工作，并于 2008 年成为正教授。他撰写了五本学术专著和 300 多篇同行评审论文。他目前的研究兴趣包括基于计算智能的优化与调度。
  1. Note. The steps in the evolution are as follows: (1) Phase 0, manual assignment of couriers to orders; (2) Phase 1, area-level one-by-one sequential order assignment based on a greedy policy; (3) Phase 2, area-level batch order assignment based on constructive heuristics; (4) Phase 3, citywide optimal order assignment based on operations research and machine learning methods.
    注：演进的步骤如下：(1) 第 0 阶段，人工将骑手分配到订单；(2) 第 1 阶段，基于贪心策略的区域级一对一顺序订单分配；(3) 第 2 阶段，基于构造性启发式的区域级批量订单分配；(4) 第 3 阶段，基于运筹学与机器学习方法的全市最优订单分配。
  2. Notes. In this example, the route shown on the left ends with a delivery to E at 11:50 a.m. The route on the right, which is clearly a longer distance, ends with a delivery to C C CC at 12:05 p.m. Most orders on the left route are delivered earlier than the orders on the right route.
    注：在此示例中，左侧显示的路线在上午 11:50 以送达 E 结束。右侧的路线明显距离更远，于下午 12:05 以送达 C C CC 结束。左侧路线上的大多数订单比右侧路线上的订单送达得更早。
